name: Six Ages: Ride Like the Wind
description:
Life between myths. Lead your clan into legend or obscurity. Six Ages: Ride Like the Wind is a storybook strategy game, immersing you in a land of old gods and magic.

Hundreds of small encounters build into an epic, multi-generational tale of survival and inter-clan alliances. Six Ages is the spiritual successor to acclaimed King of Dragon Pass, taking place thousands of years earlier in the same shared world of Glorantha.

task.description: Installing Six Ages - Ride Like the Wind
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/GameName/Ride Like the Wind.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Six Ages - Ride Like the Wind
    executable: ${file1}
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
